import React, {useState} from 'react' import './HorzBox.css'; import SwapHorizIcon from '@material-ui/icons/SwapHoriz'; function HorzBox(props) { const [inputNum, setInputNum] = useState("1") const [selectedCoin, setSelectedCoin] = useState=("btc") function unitsChange(e){ setInputNum(e.target.value) } return (

Buy

Sell

Balance

Today's Price:
{props.bitcoinPrice}

Total Price:
{props.bitcoinPrice * inputNum}

) } export default HorzBox
